alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 01 at 8:19PM CDT until September 02 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pascagoula At Merrill affecting George, Jackson and Greene Counties. For the Pascagoula River...including Merrill...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Pascagoula At Merrill. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 23.5 feet, Water is under homes in Plum Bluff Estates. Streets of Merrill flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 22.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Friday afternoon and continue falling to 10.9 feet Tuesday evening. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/mob. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
